GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article:id.description: return the artcile for the given article_id

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: return an array of comments for the article at the given article_id

exampleResponse.body: This is a bad article name
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: update votes property for the given article, request body accepts an object { inc_votes: newVote }

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/users.description: return an array of all users

GET /api/articles?topic.description: return an array of articles of the given topic
